typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as string,
		VendorID as string,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as string,
		InvoiceTotal as string,
		PaymentTotal as string,
		CreditTotal as string,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as string,
		PaymentDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 derive(LastUpdatedDateTime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'America/Chicago')) ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['InvoiceID'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
